turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a grande mocha Frappucino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok sure, and to confirm, you want to order coffee from starbucks, is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. did you have a milk preference for your drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. and which starbucks did you want to place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks at 4609 Queens Boulevard, Sunnyside, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you want to order a grande mocha frappucino with skim milk and no whipped cream at the starbucks in on queens boulevard in sunny side new york.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total for this order will be $5.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to charge the card on file now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready in 6 minutes for pick up. Enjoy!
